author: cmpilato
msg: (svn_client_switch): Use the actual fetched revision of the file
(that is, after all, why we fetched it...)
(dav_svn_build_uri): URI-encode the `path' portion of the URI.

author: kfogel
msg: (check_non_ascii): Make a more helpful error message.
Note: "make check" appears to be broken in all the switch tests right
now, but I'm guessing that's what cmpilato was referring to in IRC
just now when he said "debugging a minor `switch' bug" :-).

author: cmpilato
msg: Failed earlier to realize that svn_ra_dav__get_baseline_info()
returned a relative PATH, not a relative URL.  Therefore, callers who
immediately thereafter join the bc_url and bc_relative returned by
this function need to URI-encode the latter.
(begin_checkout, svn_ra_dav__get_file): URI-encode paths appended to URLs.

author: cmpilato
msg: Make libsvn_ra_dav use URI-encoded URLs internally.
(svn_ra_dav__do_check_path): URI-encode components added to a URL.
(handle_resource): URI-decode URL portions used as filesystem paths.
(my_basename): URI-decode URL portions used as filesystems paths.
(svn_ra_dav__get_file): URI-encode components added to a URL.
(close_edit): Give written notice of sneakiness (unrelated to rest
